content.p: The confirmed dates and times for each faculty's graduation ceremony is listed below. Click on your relevant faculty to be taken to the full list of ceremonies. Faculty of Arts | Faculty of Engineering | Faculty of Medicine and Health Science | Faculty of Social Sciences | Faculty of Science Tuesday 10 December 2024, 1.30pm Tuesday 10 December 2024, 4pm Mechanical, Materials and Manufacturing Engineering Faculty of Engineering Research Wednesday 11 December 2024, 10.30am Wednesday 11 December 2024, 1.30pm Wednesday 11 December 2024, 4pm Thursday 12 December 2024, 10:30am School of Sociology and Social Policy School of Education Thursday 12 December 2024, 1.30pm Nottingham University Business School (Msc Marketing and MBA students only) Nottingham University Business School (except MSc Marketing and MBA students) Thursday 12 December 2024, 4pm School of Biosciences Friday 13 December 2024, 10.30am School of Chemistry School of Psychology School of Computer Science Friday 13 December 2024, 1.30pm School of Mathematical Sciences School of Pharmacy School of Physics
